What are the treatments for Miller-Dieker syndrome ?,These resources address the diagnosis or management of Miller-Dieker syndrome:  - Gene Review: Gene Review: LIS1-Associated Lissencephaly/Subcortical Band Heterotopia  - Genetic Testing Registry: Miller Die
